channel.title: Arga source
channel.description:
Well we decided to make it a free bot. Since it was leaked we decided to realease their revision which to be honest is shit. Detectable and we havnt finished converting into the brand new bot. Our site is rs-resources.com but allregs are now closed. We owe pplsuqbawls alot. <3. <3 Iamadam, <3 Zappacky, <3 virtual master, <3 yomamma'/psyco and duh me. We atm are the active devs Im not someone to be blackmaild and since they were using this over us. Its been released. [b]I release this hoping you wil all learn something.[/b] SO enjoy. The gui on this rev isnt even finished lmfao. http://www.megaupload.com/?d=Q1RUGGDD .. This is the file they released. It has the source( i checked) but someone reported a potential virus. Please download at own risk -Taios as a last reply. Its cool RLN, Oh and,
Nade says: he probably stole some db backup Nade says: mopar is a douche
Mopar has the strongest community here. Someone got owned i think. Sore looser. Nade.....Grow up, kthxbi The bot will be for people willing to learn and people who already no a fair bit. No leeches. p.s soz for bad spelling its 1am

item.title: Arga source
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

[quote=“Aftermath_96, post:38, topic:4427”]Thanks for the fix, Taios, but:

Opening ARGA
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NullPointerException
at LoadScriptRun.addFilesToCombo(LoadScriptRun.java:159)
at LoadScriptRun.(LoadScriptRun.java:42)
at LoadScriptRun.main(LoadScriptRun.java:36)
ARGA has been closed.
press q to quit,s to reset server, or f to go to features [q/s/f][/quote]

Yup as expected, good good. If you look through the code you will spot the reason why.

Theres no point giving me support for this. Its not even in beta…

Read full topic

item.title: Arga source
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

[quote=“Aftermath_96, post:36, topic:4427”]LoadScriptRun.java:66: cannot find symbol
symbol : method add(java.awt.Font)
location: class javax.swing.JPanel
p.add(Arga);
^
1 error[/quote]

That was my fault. It was 1am and i needed to shove that in so i got an error and new the next morning where to start. comment out p.add(Arga); ,

Wenakko we havnt finished yet. It will be free to members of rsr but currently registrations have closed sooo, we will be introducing a kinda quiz to the registration, you get most questions right you get invited to join rs-resources. Also people who dont contribute, help or anything else will probaly be pruned from it… So in the end we are hoping to have a comunity with hardly any leeches, just people who want to learn.

Read full topic

item.title: Arga source
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

[quote=“Rictoo, post:29, topic:4427”][quote author=Taios link=topic=5743.msg59025#msg59025 date=1152295077]

Just Decompile the class?

Its open source you numpty, Rictoo.
Kryptizzler Hmm, i suppose you can use things so long as credit is given. The AppletStub is already done and there isnt much need to do anymore. Its simply otherthings that need doing ie the ScriptLoader.

[/quote]

You numpty Taios I was referring to this:

Well no duh. You have to end a bracket with a bracket. For the other one, put the “;” after the return and before the bracket.

I fixed those errors but then there were 10 more and I was sad

[quote author=Kryptizzler link=topic=5743.msg58898#msg58898 date=1152280642]
ScriptLib was like… uploaded halfway through. You don’t need to compile before running it, as it is already compile.
[/quote][/quote]

So was i. I also meant to put in to just delete ScriptLib, since theres no real use for it, nvm iamadam said anyways <3

You can scan the source but theres nothing there and thus a waste of time. If you wish to though go ahead :).

Read full topic

item.title: Arga source
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

[quote=“wL, post:16, topic:4427”][quote author=moparisthebest link=topic=5743.msg58682#msg58682 date=1152239674]

mopar, what’s the point of posting the TEXT of a jotti scan?

so people can see the scan for themselves

[/quote]
I think the he means there’s no point in scanning source code. I know there’s binaries in it, but you can delete them right away because it’s just standard tools an OS is equipped with anyways (at least real OSes).
But on the other side you can see that, incase there’s actually malicious code in there, the guy is not a skript kiddie but made its own code not picked up by the mainstream scanners (or at least knows how to trick them).[/quote]

No, what I meant was that you can edit text with almost no effort (see my fake scan quote). Yes, I trust mopar to not post a fake “clean” rating but tons of people just post a text quote of the results and it means nothing coming from most of them.
A screenshot is slightly harder to fake.

edit: the point about scanning source code is true too

Read full topic

item.title: Arga source
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

[quote=“sdouble, post:9, topic:4427”]I must be misunderstanding something?

Well we decided to make it a free bot. Since it was leaked we decided to realease their revision which to be honest is shit.

So it will be a free bot, it’s not just a “here’s what is already free, we say have this for free because it sucks and when we make it better it will no longer be free” type of thing? Many users on this forum will get the wrong idea if that’s the case and expect you to actually be releasing a free bot. I was confused because you’re releasing what was already leaked and I assume you have done better. It would only make sense to release the best thing you have right now if it was truly a free bot. Let’s not get all of the people waiting for the next Aryan all excited just to shoot them down in the end.

Also, how is the scripting going to be? What language?

Thanks.[/quote]

Whoops that came out wrong sorry. The final version will be closed source and free. The one they leaked is an old revision and its crap lol…

Read full topic

item.title: Arga source
item.dc:creator: @wL1 wL
item.description:
@wL1 wrote:

[quote=“moparisthebest, post:15, topic:4427”][quote author=Krichevskoy link=topic=5743.msg58668#msg58668 date=1152237639]
mopar, what’s the point of posting the TEXT of a jotti scan?
[/quote]

so people can see the scan for themselves ;)[/quote]
I think the he means there’s no point in scanning source code. I know there’s binaries in it, but you can delete them right away because it’s just standard tools an OS is equipped with anyways (at least real OSes).
But on the other side you can see that, incase there’s actually malicious code in there, the guy is not a skript kiddie but made its own code not picked up by the mainstream scanners (or at least knows how to trick them).

Read full topic
